krion.h3: KRION™ the Solid Surface from PORCELANOSA Group
krion.contenido:
KRION™ is a new generation solid surface developed by SYSTEMPOOL, a company that belongs to the Porcelanosa Group.

It is a material that is warm to the touch and similar to natural stone. It is made of two-thirds natural minerals (ATH – Alumina Trihydrate) and a low percentage of high-resistance resins. This composition gives KRION™ a number of exclusive features: it does not have any pores, it is anti-bacterial without any type of additive, it is hard-wearing, highly resistant and easy to repair, only requires minimum maintenance and is easy to clean.

It is cut in a similar way to wood, allowing us to cut the sheets, connect them and thermoform them to create curved sections, and can even be injected during the production process, making it possible to create different designs and projects that are impossible to achieve with other materials.

Seamless sections can be created, preventing liquids from being absorbed and making cleaning and maintenance easier.

We offer a wide range of colours, including a white finish that stands out for its purity and neutrality in comparison with other similar material.

It is an ecological material, as it is 100% recyclable. All products made of KRION™ can be reprocessed and reused in the production cycle.

propiedades.antibacterias_content: KRION™ does not allow bacteria or fungi to grow or spread. This is an intrinsic property of the composition of the material, without the need for additives to achieve this permanent effect.
propiedades.ultrablanco_content: Technically KRION™ achieves a Whiteness of 99,8%, if we combine this with its high Light Reflective Value, we find a pure and luminous material, something unique in Solid Surface materials.
propiedades.fuego_content:
KRION™ product range is considered to be practically fireproof as it does not allow fire to spread. It is classified as Euroclass B-s1-do according to the UNE-EN 13501 standard and as B1 (with no
restrictions) according to DIN 4102.
propiedades.reciclable_content: KRION® is an ecological material, as it is 100% recyclable. Any product made of KRION® can be reprocessed and used again in its production process.
propiedades.extremos_content: KRION™ surfaces are capable of withstanding extreme environments, such as marine environments, exposure to steam, immersion in water or freezing conditions, amongst others.
propiedades.mineral_content: This material is made of two-thirds natural minerals and a low percentage of high-resistance resins.
propiedades.limpieza_content: Any normal stain, superficial burn, graffiti or marker pen stain can be removed, immediately returning the surface to its original appearance simply by following the recommended cleaning instructions.
propiedades.peso_content:
Because KRION® has a lower density than other solid surfaces, like high-performance porcelain, artificial quartz or natural marble, it is easier to handle, for instance in the creation of countertops
and more lightweight furniture, without relinquishing all the other properties of this solid surface.
propiedades.juntas_content: KRION™ sheets and shapes can be bonded together using bonding kits of a similar composition to KRION™. This guarantees uniform physical and chemical properties throughout.
propiedades.conductividad_content: Thermal conductivity is a physical property, determining a material’s capacity to transmit heat. The lower the thermal conductivity, the higher the material’s insulative capacity. Using KRION™ on walls or other surfaces contributes to the energy efficiency of rooms or façades.
propiedades.resistente_content: Bending strength is a combination of tensile and compressive strength. This type of load can deform materials by making them sag. Many solid materials cannot withstand high loads and they crack. In contrast, KRION™has a high bending strength. Thanks to its high bending strength, it is easier to transport and it can be used to create aesthetically pleasing overhanging sections and surfaces with higher safety guarantees than other materials.
propiedades.poroso_content: KRION® is a non-porous material and so it prevents the build-up of bacteria. This makes it ideal for places with strict health and hygiene conditions, such as operating theatres or clean rooms.
propiedades.impacto_content: KRION®  has the highest capacity to absorb impacts of all solid surfaces. In impact tests using largediameter balls (324 g) dropped from a height of 1.9 metres, it withstood ten consecutive impacts without breaking, demonstrating its very high resistance.
propiedades.solar_content: KRION® stands out for its remarkable stability when exposed to ultraviolet (UV) rays. The most stable colour is white; please consult the manufacturer for information on other colours.
propiedades.aislamiento_content: Thanks to its intrinsic physical properties - a seamless, low-density material of varying thicknesses with no pores -, KRION® helps to insulate noise. This is due to its density, nil porosity, different thicknesses, and lack of seams. More specifically, if the noise level is reduced by 10 decibels, the human ear hears just half the resulting intensity. KRION® can reduce the noise level by up to 14 decibels.
propiedades.alimentario_content: KRION™ is a food-grade product and meets US and European standards, meaning it can be used in contact with foodstuffs.
propiedades.compresion_content: A compression test is a test used to determine a material’s resistance or capacity to withstand a certain load without it breaking or becoming deformed. Thanks to its high compressive strength, KRION™ has a compressive performance on a par with stone. These values can be used by designers and/or architects to calculate the design parameters for structures.
propiedades.antiestatico_content:
Static electricity is a build-up of electrical charges on the surface of a material, sometimes generated by friction with another material. Many materials are classified according to their electrical resistivity.
KRION® is rated as being anti-static and very close to insulative, according to the ESD (Electrostatic Discharge Association).
propiedades.termocurvado_content: KRION® sheets can be thermoformed to create curves or shapes of varying radii.
propiedades.retroiluminacion_content: KRION® Lux can be used to create backlit spaces. B

proyectos.h3_008: Clínica Dental Ortega & Cubillo - Granada - España
proyectos.content_008: In the centre of Granada, on Acera del Darro no. 80, a few metres away from the patron saint of Granada, Virgen de las Angustias, is the Ortega & Cubillo Dental Clinic which has used the solid surface by PORCELANOSA Group, KRION® in the reception and box-like compartments.
proyectos.content_014:
Since its origins in the fifteenth century, the Puerta del Sol in Madrid has undergone many changes, in fact the only thing that has not changed is its altitude, 635 metres above sea level. To date, everything else about this square has remained alive and in constant evolution, becoming an essential stop for all those tourists visiting the city of Madrid.

Some of the store furnishings use KRION® and we must highlight the spectacular KRION® bas-relief walls designed by 3G Office, which Vodafone lights up using home automation programming, creating a series of scenarios where the corporate logo lights up, and even a setting that interacts with the famous chimes announcing the New Year.
proyectos.content_018: We moved to the city of Castellon where an innovative interior design project was carried out, using KRION®, the new generation Solid Surface developed by Systempool. The doctors Federico Rambla and Maria Vilar, Specialized in Dentistry and Gynecology respectively, decided to join their knowledge and skills to open this new clinic, creating a joint and unified corporate image.
proyectos.content_025: PORCELANOSA Group has formed part of the renovation of this space into a spectacular single family home. Occasionally our hobbies become a starting point for something bigger, and in this case the owners of the home were in charge of designing the interior and selecting each of the details that we can find inside. Unrelated to the world of design, with only good ideas and the aim of converting their home into a comfortable, practical place to live in, this home is a clear demonstration that when care is applied to things, they turn out well.
proyectos.content_027:
A characteristic that defines KRION® is its versatility, since it is a material that has many applications in the world of architecture and interior design. This is perfectly demonstrated in the interior design project at the Gerhardt Braun Gallery.

The owner, Gerhardt Braun, had a very clear concept of the gallery he wanted, and what kind of decoration best suited him. These premises. For this reason, he contacted VF Aplicaciones professionals, who were in charge of the assembly of the bar made with KRION®, the new generation Solid Surface developed by the Porcelanosa Group.

Bar made with KRION® Snow is the central element of the entrance of the gallery and on which the rest of the decorative elements revolve. By means of the technique of the heat-curved it has been possible to give a curved form to the bar, Another of the characteristics that presents is the no perception of joints in any part of its surface, creating a clean and light visual effect. On the front of it you can see the logo of the gallery formed by the letters GB on a circle of green background. The corporate logo is backlit on the bar, giving it a more chic touch. All these characteristics are adding reasons for visitors to the gallery to focus on this spectacular bar of KRION®.

The gallery is located in Palma de Mallorca, next to an interior design shop , Specialized in lighting, owned by Gerhardt Braun, called Gerhardt Braun Lighting. The gallery regularly hosts different artists who individually exhibit their photography, sculpture and painting works.
proyectos.content_028:
We begin the year by looking back on one of the projects which marked the start of our journey, and which is still a reference point and inspiration for work well done, as is required for forming part of the PORCELANOSA Group.

Inúu is a complementary project of Caldea, based on the Wellness Attitude and its exclusive services. In most of the facilities of this part of the centre we find the mineral KRION®: the counters, the reception, the changing rooms, the restaurant bar, and the bathroom countertops. There are endless applications for our compact mineral KRION® within the benchmark for modernism, elegance and practicality, encompassed by the Caldea-Inúu concept.
proyectos.content_029: The entrance of this hotel designed by Olivier Lapidus already surprises the visitor with a modern and innovative counter made with KRION®, the new generation Solid Surface developed by Systempool. The structure is formed by a succession of KRION® plates with wavy shapes superimposed one on top of the other. In addition, each of them has a different length, which together with the backlight some of them present, create a striking optical effect.
proyectos.content_030: Anne Peyroux and Emmanuelle Thisy, form the peyroux & thisy company, they have been responsible for the remodeling of the Hotel-Boutique Chavanel, located in the exclusive district of La Madeleine in Paris. The hotel has 27 rooms, at the express wish of the owner Sophie Charlet, each piece of furniture is unique and unique, having as a connecting link the head of the bed made with KRION® milled in relief and illuminated. We can also find the PORCELANOSA Group's compact mineral in the reception hall, made with circular shape and recessed socket. Hotel Chavanel without any doubt, a great choice.
proyectos.content_031: After spending a lifetime following a dream, Dr. Iván Mañero achieved his goal in January, opening IM CLINIC, a plastic and cosmetic surgery institute, world renowned for its technology, development and research, located in Sant Cugat del Vallés, Barcelona.
proyectos.content_032: Raskl. Design Studio & amp; Workshop, with an experience of 13 years in the world of design, is a study with a great confidence in its possibilities, which has as motto for its projects ”If you want it, find the way to do it”, either for themselves Or collaborating with other artists. The maxima referents in the design area of this young study are Kendo, Rams & Lubs or Marc Newsom, among others.
proyectos.content_033: The restlessness of Quico Torres by the search of new materials, took to our solid surface. The artist confesses, ”... KRION® created in me a new motivation, the target that I had just discovered was pure and perfect. There appears before me a list of new colors as well as the Light Lux range that gives the possibility of creating a work of art where light appears inside the work. This material is strong and at the same time moldable with elegant and clean finishes that make the work of an ethereal sensation, creating the viewer a visual and emotional attraction. These three sculptures, Danzar, Sueños and Edén, could never have been executed with the other materials that he was using. KRION® offers me the possibility of being able to work to the limit impossible ways and reaching extremes unimaginable for me.”
proyectos.h3_034: Hotel NH Mindoro (Castellon de la Plana)
proyectos.content_034:
Located opposite the Main Theater of Castellón, is one of the hotels with more solera of the city, the Hotel NH Mindoro ****. This has been recently refurbished giving it a new modern look, elegant and comfortable, and that better material than the compact mineral of the PORCELANOSA Group to meet these needs. We can find KRION® in various places in the hall, the wall covering where the elevators are, the reception desk, the bar bar and the high stool table.

The NH Mindoro Hotel**** is an excellent venue for events and meetings, it has conference rooms for up to 250 people. KRION® made in these facilities part of the first Meeting with English professionals, and the result was exceptional.

Project realized by NG Espacios.
proyectos.content_035:
The renowned Scottish designer Jim Hamilton has again chosen KRION® for one of his projects, the Lido restaurant located in the city of Toon, Scotland, and belonging to the chain Buzzworks Holdings owned by the catering industry Colin Blair .

Jim Hamilton, I already masterfully use the Porcelanosa Group's compact mineral in its Radisson Blu Mall of America hotel project, in the Lido restaurant presents KRION® in the backlit façade, welcome counter, bar, tables High in the bar area, restaurant tables and pits with upholstered circular seats.

MGP Architects have been commissioned for the technical part of the Lido restaurant, while Transition Interiors Ltd., headed by Stephen Brownlow (Managing Director), Kelvin Murray (Manufacturing Director) and Dave Leahy (Installation Director), has been in charge of realizing this project.

Images: Alun J Williamson, Creative BRAW
proyectos.h3_036: Ecole Maternelle Olympe de Gouges (Le Plessis Trévise - France)
proyectos.content_036:
The writer, playwright and French politician Olympe de Gouges, names this spectacular nursery, located in the town of Le Plessis-Trévise, Ile de France. On both sides of the facade, we find KRION® Snow 1100, with joined plates of thickness 12 mm. It has a fiberglass mesh in its back, and fastened by the fixing system of Butech® (company of the PORCELANOSA Group dedicated to constructive solutions, and a worldwide reference in ventilated façade). The pieces are machined with leaves and stars, some of them filled with KRION® adhesive, which give a colorful finish to this impressive construction made by the architectural studio ”Atelier Pierre Dubbus”. Images by Paul Kozlowski.

BUTECH® & KRION® is always a great decision.
proyectos.content_037:
Over a year ago we presented the recently finalised Bershka Hilversum project, in Holland; and today we look again at this spectacular facade made from KRION®, the compact mineral from the PORCELANOSA Group, installed by Butech, one of the 8 companies which make up the group, presenting new images of the project.

The design created by Castel Veciana Arquitectura, consists of 90m2 of KRION® Stone, and is designed with parallel large format pieces laid out vertically and horizontally.
proyectos.content_038: Rafael Llamazares and Joaquín Torres at A-Cero have amazed us once again by presenting the spectacular design of a penthouse in Gandia. The PORCELANOSA Group compact mineral, KRION®, glows in all its glory connecting the70m2 dining room and kitchen spaces. The first thing you see when entering the living-dining room is the remarkable KRION® false ceiling which flows through the space down the columns, forming countertops without any joints. KRION® is integrated in the entire space; on the textured walls (which lead to the different rooms), on the partition walls (with screen-like curved sheets), on the extractor fan which opens out in between the kitchen cupboards that are connected to the roof and above the KRION® column, creating a sculptural element in the centre of the living room. These features make you feel as if you are living a once in a life time experience. Work performed by VF Aplicaciones.
proyectos.h3_039: Noa Banc in Flushing - New York (Custom Counters by Precision)
proyectos.content_039:
Noah Banco ofrece productos y servicios financieros a las comunidades , principalmente coreano-estadounidenses en el sureste de Pennsylvania, El norte de Nueva Jersey, Manhattan y Flushing, Nueva York , y el área metropolitana de DC.

También ofrecemos financiación de pequeñas empresas en una variedad de otras comunidades étnicas de América , como el chino -americano, Indo -americano, Latinoamericano , así como la financiación para las empresas de propiedad judía.

Entendemos sus desafíos y nos esforzamos para ayudar a tener éxito.

Noah Banco se especializa en préstamos de la SBA a pequeños negocios y tenemos un historial de éxito.

En el año fiscal de la SBA al 30 de septiembre de 2013, Noah Banco ocupó el primer lugar en los dólares prestados en la región de Nueva Jersey, segundo en dólares prestado en la región de Nueva York, y el 11 en dólares prestados a nivel nacional.

Hemos esbozado nuestro personal de préstamo y ubicación de nuestras oficinas en las páginas de nuestro sitio web.

Si usted tiene una necesidad de financiación para su pequeña empresa , por favor llame a uno de nuestros prestamistas , y lo tomaremos de allí.

Ya verás lo que nos hace - su banco para el negocio!
proyectos.content_041:
In Villarreal, near the epicenter of the PORCELANOSA Group, is the Ristorante / Pizzeria Da Vinci. Fran Silvestre Architects have used KRION® to create an urban element, which, as we are told, ”serves the restaurant, expanding its space and transforming the life of the street. While not in operation, its geometry does not interfere with pedestrian traffic. These improvise new uses for the project, as a meeting point, as a playground, as a shadow ... The arrangement of the supports generates a dynamic reading of the piece, which seems to be cantilevered or biapoyada according to the different points of view ”

The project was carried out in two phases, the first one was Parma Creations, and the second was Butech®, one of the companies in the PORCELANOSA Group, / P>

Photographs made by Alfonso Calza.
proyectos.content_042:
The MUHER study, composed by the architects Manuel Herrera, Francisco Muñoz and the craftsman Pedro Pallares, have designed this idyllic summer residence, based on a rock facing the Mediterranean, has solved the conditions that presented the land with a design in which its Surrounding environment, it enhances the feeling of being on an island surrounded by water.

Within this unique dwelling, we find open spaces open to the sea in which the kitchen made with the compact mineral of the PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, shines with its own light, both during the day for its pure white, and when the night comes with the illumination by means of lets, that gives to the stay an elegant touch and sophisticated at the same time that warm and cozy. >

KRION ® transformed by Galian Solid Surface - Images Juan de la Cruz.
proyectos.content_043: On Playa d’en Bossa, one of the most Premium locations of the island (as Abel Matutes Prats, Director General of Palladium Hotels, part of the Matutes business group, tells us), we find the new Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza, based on the structure of the former Don Toni hotel, and completely remodelled. The hotel has 493 rooms, and 14 bars and restaurants (notably the Estado Puro tapas bar and the Sublimotion gourmet restaurant), more than 14 common areas, 12 types of room, a convention hall for 700 people and a large terrace on the 9th floor.
proyectos.content_044:
Just 100 meters from one of the main tourist attractions in Spain, Zocodover Square, Toledo, is the new San Agustín Market. In a space of 1400 m2 its authors A.M.A. Estudio de Arquitectura have preserved the façade of two old houses in Toledo, in a space of 5 floors with a wide range of products. One of the most colorful decorative details are the walls, in them the original hydraulic flooring of the houses is reused; Next to the vertical garden that occupies the 5 floors, we find a lattice mechanized with geometric forms realized with the compact mineral of the Group PORCELANOSA, this occupies approximately 15 meters of height without any type of joint, what makes this lattice more special if it is possible Its location in the elevator shaft. Our material KRION® Snow 1100, thanks to its light pigmentation achieved by the high purity of our aluminas, is a translucent material, creating a spectacular effect with the passage of the lighted elevator. We can also find the Solid Surface of the PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, in the vinacotecas and bars of the market. A.M.A. Study of Architecture in collaboration with the group Boa Mistura, have managed to recover the traditional character of the market, adapting it to the criteria of the 21st century. In this merger, Luis Moreno, the architect responsible for the project, has been of vital importance the advice of Pepe Rodríguez, winner of the 2010 National Gastronomy Award, and recently recognized for being a member of the jury of the television program ”Masterchef.”

Projects made by: Revestimiento vertical - Marmoles Ruedas, SL / Vinacotecas and Bars - Encidecor, S.L.
proyectos.content_045: At the centre of Madrid, in the Barrio de las Letras arts district, the Hotel ibis Styles Madrid Prado is located right in the Triangle of Art, very close to the house of Lope de Vega and the place where Miguel de Cervantes, writer of Don Quixote, lived and died, a few steps from the Puerta de Sol and Plaza Mayor.
proyectos.h3_046: Cheese Bar Barcelona by estudi{H}ac – KRION®
proyectos.content_046: The estudi{H}ac interior design studio has designed the new Poncelet Cheese Bar Barcelona, located within the Hotel Meliá Sarriá. This new culinary space occupies a total of 400 square metres on the ground floor of the hotel, and is intended as a meeting place for lovers of cheese and culture, as well as a perfect place allowing anyone to enjoy the new highly specialised gastronomic products.
proyectos.content_047:
Izaskun Larzabal, head of Ezketa S.L.P., was the architect chosen to undertake the Hotel Zenit de San Sebastián project. Located in the Amara neighbourhood of the Morlans Behera area in Donosti, this 4 star hotel was opened last September with a capacity of 80 rooms. Hotel Zenit was become a point of reference in the city, not only for its high quality standards, but also for its elegance and modernity. When we speak of quality and design, KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, is the best choice.

The 3 faced facade is made with the hidden anchoring system by Butech (a firm of the PORCELANOSA Group), and the quality of KRION® Snow White sheets. This impressive ventilated facade uses 3200m2 of KRION®. On the rear part of the building we find 186m2 of curved covering, which gives meaning to the design by Izaskun Larzabal, explained on her website as using the upper body of the building as a sculptural piece on a pedestal which is supported by a continuous plinth running around the lower floor.
proyectos.content_049:
Under the slogan “Live to eat”, the first Tony Macaroni restaurant opened in 2008 in East Kilbride. Today we would like to speak about the new restaurant located at the heart of the bustling Scottish capital, Edinburgh. It serves first class Italian food from a wood-burning oven for pizza and an open kitchen where we can see the expert chefs using the freshest ingredients to carefully prepare each of the diners’ culinary selections.

At Tony Macaroni in Edinburgh, we can find the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group in much of the premises, including the dazzling backlit low relief made with KRION® upon which the name Prosecco Bar appears, and in criss-crossed trellises. The bar, the tables and the countertops in the bathroom are also made with the KRION® Solid Surface.

KRION® cast by 2-T Joiners Edinburgh - Design
proyectos.content_050: When an architecture studio like that of Fran Silvestre is presented with a material with the characteristics of KRION®, possibilities become infinite; and this project in Bétera, Valencia, is a clear example of the boundless ingenuity of Fran Silvestre Arquitectos.
proyectos.content_051:
In paseo de la Castellana 8, one of the most emblematic areas of the Spanish capital, is OTTO Madrid, a place for the fashion of the city, which is not only a restaurant for fresh, local produce which seeks to maintain Mediterranean roots, but also a place where the glamourous lounge area and marvellous chic terrace are found, perfect for spending time after work, meeting people, having a drink and listening to good music.

We can find KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, in several of the rooms of the premises. In the lounge area, the curved bar with circular backlit precision grinded low relief is one of the most significant pieces in the avant garde design created by renowned architect and interior designer Tomás Alía for OTTO Madrid. The countertops of the bathrooms are in keeping with the rest of the project, being pieces of an exclusive design made with KRION® which show us the taste for small details, which make OTTO Madrid a place which must be visited.
proyectos.content_052:
A well-known Italian fashion company has used the most innovative materials and technical solutions of PORCELANOSA Group to give shape to the facade of its new headquarters in the beautiful city of Carpi.

One of the keys to the spectacular facade of the building is the PORCELANOSA Group solid surface. In total, 3,000 square metres of Krion® Lux 1100 were installed on the exterior of the building, with asymmetric designs. To achieve a perfect finish, the plates of Krion® mineral compact were installed using the Keil facade system developed by Butech, consisting of the rear machining of the plates to leave the anchoring system hidden.
proyectos.content_053:
In the Bay of San Antonio, Ibiza, Spain, one of the best known places for European tourism due to its spectacular sunsets, idyllic beaches, gastronomy and its numerous parties, the THB Ocean Beach four star hotel is found, an unbeatable place for spending our holidays.

The facilities of the renovated THB Ocean Beach hotel have 22 double rooms, 35 junior suites and 6 suites, and inside the complex we can enjoy the Ocean Beach Club, where a unique experience of the purest Ibizan style is felt.
proyectos.content_054:
KREUS is a family of pieces for the home made with old recovered wood, natural leather and KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group.

Nihil Estudio is the creator of KREUS, which explores the contrast between materials of different origins, textures, colours, etc. – a combination which is not accidental. The TAMTUM bargueño desk, the CAPSULA table, the BRACÁ units and the CULMEN shelf are created with attention to detail, sizes, the language of the materials and the sensation and emotions which they evoke. Their design shapes elements with different practical uses and with versatile characteristics which furthermore are almost sculptural pieces of art. They contain pure lines, perspectives and proportions.
proyectos.h3_055: KRION® and PORCELANOSA Group in the University Of Illinois – Chicago
proyectos.content_055:
Northeaster Illinois University, Chicago – USA, has commissioned the JGMA studio for the extension of its campus, as studio known for its contemporary vision of architecture. In this project we are shown a futuristic and entertaining building, embodied by the asymmetrical bicoloured panels which surround the centre. Moving towards Chicago we see the colour yellow, while if we return in the opposite direction we see blue. This amazing, fresh and interactive vision by the JGMA studio is transforming the skyline of the city of Chicago.

In the interior of the building we find KRION®, the compact mineral from the PORCELANOSA Group, in the reception where it has been extended to create a connection with slanting forms, curving to cover the entrance to the elevators and the rest of the vertical covering. The estudio JGMAalso amazes us by taking the colour 4201 Yellow Light out of its natural habitat, translucency, making it a warm colour with a sensitive aspect, but with the resistance and properties of our cutting edge Solid Surface, KRION®.
proyectos.content_056: In this project carried out in Altea, Alicante - Spain, in an exceptional case, we will begin by discussing the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, leaving the architect who created the project, Antonio Maciá Mateu, to present his own view on this renovation which has not gone unnoticed.
proyectos.h3_057: Font de Mora Pharmacy - Villarreal - España
proyectos.content_057:
José Luis Rokiski (Rokiski Arquitectos architects) has been entrusted with carrying out this ground-breaking project, located where the PORCELANOSA Group was created and developed: Villarreal, Castellón.

The studio selected the patented ventilated facade system by Butech, the final finish of which (created with KRION®) has provided the Farmacia Font de Mora pharmacy with a resistant, sustainable and highly energy efficient finish. For this project, the material chosen was KRION® 1100 Snow White, using 200m2 of the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group. In the facade we can see the different properties of the material such as the unnoticeable joins, low relief milling of the signage, its antibacterial properties and intense whiteness.

The Farmacia Font de Mora pharmacy is a clear example of how KRION® = MORE PROPERTIES, MORE POSSIBILITIES, and MORE APPLICATIONS.
proyectos.h3_058: “Club de Tenis Valencia” remodelled with KRION®
proyectos.content_058:
The Club de Tenis Valencia tennis club (Spain), entrusted BFM Aedificatoria and Estudio Gallardo Llopis Arquitectura to carry out the renovation project of the changing rooms of this sports club, created in 1905 and initially located in the Alameda of Valencia, and currently found in C/ Botánico Cabanilles, nº 7.

Both the club and the project managers entrusted the PORCELANOSA Group with the renovation of 350 square metres, 200 of which are occupied by women’s changing rooms, and 150 by men’s changing rooms. We can find KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, used in several ways in the bath area, the shower trays, and the specially measured countertop washbasins.

KRION® cast by Creaciones Parma.
proyectos.h3_059: Farmacia Gran Vía pharmacy uses KRION® - Valencia - España
proyectos.content_059:
AID arquitectos architects, run by Cuevasanta Morro, has been entrusted with remodelling this unique pharmacy located in Gran Vía Marqués del Turia nº 55, Valencia, Spain. And what makes it more than a pharmacy? The fact that they do not just sell the usual pharmaceuticals in this establishment, but also offer services such as hearing tests, orthopaedics, dermo-cosmetics, nutritional and dietetic consultancy, homeopathy, master formulae, medicinal plants, and control tests. These services and more make the pharmacy run by Anna Beltrán a different kind of establishment, its spirit of solidarity being worthy of our upcoming news, which you can see through this link: “Ana Vives”.

The compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group is an important element both in the interior and the exterior of the apothecary’s establishment. We can find KRION® 1100 Snow White in the indoor furniture, 1508 Dark Brown on the storefront where the logo is found, as well as in the interior ceiling of the establishment, and the backlit 4102 Extreme Light colour KRION® in all its thicknesses at the entrance door. Ultimately, KRION® is ideal for any health facility.

KRION® crafted by News Comunicación e Imágenes, S.L.
proyectos.content_060:
In Gran Vía, at the bustling heart of Madrid, this spectacular building constructed in 1924 is found, and is one of the buildings with the most character in Spain’s capital. It is notable for the large Sala Real, known as a dance hall, where large events have been held, and which continues to be the main hall of what used to be the headquarters of the Commercial and Industrial Union Club of Madrid.

The casino has over 4,500 square metres dedicated to the largest and most innovative collection of games machines in Madrid. Inside we can find the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group in two of its rooms. In the GV24 Artist´s Bar cafeteria, curved, backlit Extreme Light KRION® can be found in Snow White, giving an innovative and futuristic touch, opening onto Gran Vía. We also find KRION® in the entrance hall, next to the lavish staircase, where the curved, backlit effect is repeated in pure white.

Casino Gran Vía more than just a casino with roulette, blackjack and poker, also offering us a multitude of additional services, live music, a cocktail lounge, restaurants, and a champagne bar. Casino Gran Vía pulsates with life day and night.
proyectos.content_061:
Bologna Airport, receives the name of one of the most illustrious Bolognese, the winner of the Nobel Award Guillermo Marconi. The architectural studio of Marco Colonnelli thought on the compact mineral from Porcelanosa Group, to make the stands, thanks to KRION® properties, its use on high traffic areas is becoming one of the most popular sectors. Really easy to clean, seamless, and antibacterial properties without additives, makes KRION® an ideal material for transport sector.

Fusion between colors 1100 Snow White and 1704 Navy Blue, has provided the area on the checking area with a single allure that makes it unique and different from any other airports.

Photographer: Gori Salva

KRION® worked by SMIA
proyectos.content_062: The “mecanismo” architecture studio, comprising of architects Pedro Rica and Marta Urtasun, has been entrusted with designing this single-family home in Madrid. “mecanismo” decided to begin to develop a new way of presenting architecture, seeing it as a versatile and customisable commercial product, able to respond to the common specific needs of our present society.
proyectos.content_063: The Clínica Ceta opted for KRION® for the reception, covering and bathrooms.
proyectos.content_064:
A year and a half ago, we promised completion of the project ”Centralcon building Shopping Mall and residential Building”, and since KRION®’s commitments become a purpose and a course of action, today Grupo PORCELANOSA is able to do what satisfies us most, that is, to come full circle and fulfil the agreements reached.

We previously reported the advanced stage of building progress, and we also talked about Indutec Solid, a company that transforms material, so now let’s talk about Butech a company belonging to the Grupo PORCELANOSA, which undertook the study and development of the structural system of the facade and provided technical support during the installation. But, most importantly, we must admire the impressive result achieved in this majestic building built in Shenzhen, China.
proyectos.h3_065: KRION® in the Cajamar technological building, and its prestigious LEED GOLD certification
proyectos.content_065:
The Arapiles Arquitectos Asociados studio has been entrusted with developing this avant-garde construction, the Cajamar technological services building. The building has 5 floors and three underground levels, with a total of 19,600m2 and a capacity for 990 workers.

This spectacular project created on the Avenida de la Innovación, Almería, was awarded a special mention at the 8th PORCELANOSA Awards. Several of the firms which make up the PORCELANOSA Group participated in this construction, including KRION®, forming the milled, low relief, backlit reception desk. The intrinsic properties of the material give the hall a modern, renewing touch, which our colour 1100 Snow White has blended with the atmosphere of sophistication and functionality of the Cajamar technological building.

Thus, great projects are always accompanied by great materials, and the combination of these has allowed Cajamar to have a building with the LEED GOLD certification. This prestigious certification has only been granted to 49 constructions in the whole of Spain and only one in Andalusia. Forming part of this project and helping to achieve this success has been a pleasure for the whole PORCELANOSA Group. Congratuations Cajamar!!!

KRION® manipulated by: Hermanos Ibarra.

Images: Juan Ramon Arevalo
proyectos.content_066:
The renowned French architecture studio, ADPI, has been entrusted with designing the new French embassy in Bangkok. The team led by Nicolás Mourín has amazed us with this contemporary reinterpretation of traditional Thai homes.

The covering of this monolithic building, with volumetric forms in different three-dimensional planes, has been created with the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Grupo. 2,600m2 of KRION® was needed for its installation, in which the latest technology in construction systems has been used, developed by Butech®, one of the 8 companies belonging to PORCELANOSA Group.

In the latest PORCELANOSA architecture and interior design awards, the ADPI studio was awarded a special mention for this project. Jean Charles Content and Mabel Mirando received the award in the celebration held at the Ritz Hotel in May. We would like to thank them for the trust they placed in KRION®, and the rest of PORCELANOSA Group.
proyectos.content_067:
When to go to the Clinic Lorente is remembered more for having manned a spacecraft, that by the same treatment, they show us that to offer the best orthodontic treatment is not only the end, the objective is to reach the excellence and to obtain it by force of illusion and Commitment, on a visit as surprising as it is pleasant. And at this point, to give added value, the PORCELANOSA Group, which has formed part of its compact KRION® mineral, comes into action.

In the Paseo de la Constitución 29, Zaragoza, Spain, Finds this amazing clinic dedicated exclusively to orthodontics. The Lorente Clinic, founded in 1984, thanks to its great experience and thousands of healthy smiles, has become a benchmark in the capital city and at the national level.

We can find KRION® largely The rooms, the backlit wall in the entrance hall, the two receptions, furniture in the rooms, the countertops in the bathrooms, and the diagnostic room made with KRION® 6501 Cream - Colors Lux.

Project transformed by Wood Industries ARLA SL
proyectos.content_068: Touza Arquitectos chose an avant-garde design, using the latest generation materials such as Krion® to create a building which transmits the innovation values and constant evolution of the 3M Company.
proyectos.content_069:
In the city of Casablanca, Morocco, the award-winning Villa Gapi restaurant project is found, by Moroccan architect Lofti Sidirahal, head of POD Arquitectura, winner of the “A' Design Award“ awarded in 2015 for this work.

Gapi is a luxury restaurant and catering company created in 1997. During 2015 it opened a new establishment which changed the course of the company. This turning point was Villa Gapi, a tea room, patisserie and chic bistro restaurant at the centre of Casablanca. It has 3 floors which are 8 metres high, and an area of 960m2, within a site of 550m2, divided between basement kitchen, lower floor tea room and café, and first floor restaurant.

We find KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, on the facade of this innovative design, in which KRION® adopts the essence of a second skin, in the form of numerous thermoformed and twisted 25cm high sheets, covering the whole facade, reaching inside the establishment, evoking the wrapping of a box of cakes.

Processed by: Excelsa Maroc

Architect: Lotfi Sidirahal

Head of design: Stephane Vaclroze
proyectos.h3_070: KRION® in a private home in Hasselt - Belgium
proyectos.content_070:
In our journey showing KRION® around the world, our next stop is one of the founding member countries of the European community: Belgium. In the north, the city of Hasselt is found, and there, Studio Lijnen & Partners has been charged with designing this private home, in which the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group blends in with the subdued and avant-garde style which the studio presents in these striking bathrooms. The design of these spaces is proof that large surfaces are not needed for creating amazing and functional designs.

We can find KRION® in several of its applications, such as washbasins, furniture, coverings and shower trays, within the bathrooms. L&P Interieurproductie has been charged with forming the KRION®, in this case 1100 Snow White.

Photographs: Marc Soubron
proyectos.content_071:
With this article we complete our summary of what has been one of our greatest pleasures in 2016, the 3deluxe project, Al Noor Island in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates (UAE). We would like to take this occasion to give thanks for the trust placed in KRION®, the 3deluxe studio, and especially its co-founders Dieter Brell and Peter Seipp.

It is difficult to summarise a project of this scale in just 3 publications, and we will surely be leaving out a multitude of extraordinary areas; but we did not want to overlook the Literature Pavilion. The presence of the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group in this space best represents our material KRION® and a multitude of its properties and applications.

The whole floor Surface of the floor, seats, vertical and horizontal coverings, curtain walls, ceilings and fountains are created with KRION®. We can find it thermoformed in 3D, sublimated and partially backlit. Drawing our attention is the semi-circle of KRION® sublimated with motifs of butterflies and flowers, functioning as a fountain with running water, combining our material with the liquid element.

The Literature Pavilion of Al Noor Island continues tradition and has a local philosophy, for sharing spaces and ideas, and communicating.
proyectos.h3_072: KRION® ventilated facade in a residential building in Meudom, in the south of Paris
proyectos.content_072:
The Agence Architecture Lanctuit studio has been entrusted with planning the Le Domaine de la Forêt residential building, located in Meudon, in the south of Paris. This is a project in which the Butech installation system has been used to install 2,700 square metres of KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, in this award winning work.

Agence Architecture Lanctuit was awarded for this project at PORCELANOSA’s 8th Architecture and Interior Design Awards. We would like to take advantage of this occasion to congratulate them on the award and thank them for trusting our material KRION®, in this case 1100 Snow White, the star colour of our collection.
proyectos.content_073: Emporium One is the renovation project of an old shopping centre, whose creator, the J+h Boiffils architecture studio, has trusted PORCELANOSA Group to create the ventilated facade using the K-Fix anchoring system from Butech, allowing the installation of curved facades. Our compact mineral KRION® was chosen for its intrinsic qualities. 1,450m2 of our star colour, 1100 Snow White, has been used, giving an aseptic ultra-white aspect with a stony appearance.
proyectos.h3_074: The visionary Hotel Envoy, Boston (USA) chooses KRION® for its high transit areas
proyectos.content_074:
Located in the harbour area, a district of innovation and one of the most prosperous emerging areas of the new Boston, is Hotel Envoy. The hotel is an equal combination of originality, hospitality and a modern touch, which has kept up with the pace of the North American city of Boston.

The architect of this project was the Add Inc/Stantec, studio, and the common areas and the 136 rooms and suites were designed by Group One Partners, who chose the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group for the high transit areas of the hotel. We can find KRION® in the reception with an organic form which evokes a bridge sculpted by nature. It is the perfect balance between the stony appearance of our 1100 Snow White colour and the thermoforming property. The rooftop bar located on the terrace gives great views of the area and has a bar made from 9507 Taupe Concrete, belonging to the KRION® Royal+ series. The doors, and also the wall which is used for the projector screen are also finished with sheets of 1100 Snow White. Finally, it is the furniture which attracts the most attention, with a futuristically shaped side table in the hall, reminiscent of a cetacean, which could easily be a creation of Herman Melville. Hotel Envoyis an experience worth visiting.

Photographer: Kyle J Caldwell

KRION® manipulated by: CW Keller
proyectos.content_075:
The Roullier Group, operating for over 50 years, specialising in plant and animal nutrition, with over 7,000 employees in 46 countries, has created its new global research and development centre in the French port city of Saint-Malo. This emblematic building project was created by renowned architect Jean Pierre Meignan, who trusted PORCELANOSA Group to create the exterior facade and interior of this spectacular construction.

The facade is made of 2,500m2 of KRION®, installed with the K-FIX construction system from Butech, a firm of the PORCELANOSA Group. The works carried out with KRION® have included the curtain wall which gives the building one of its main, recognisable lines of expression, marking its character. Additionally, the canopy at the entrance of the global research centre is also made from KRION® Light Grey 6902.

Its location just 20 metres from the Atlantic Ocean led the studio of Jean Pierre Meignan to use a material which offers durability over time, and against the elements such as the potassium nitrate which is present near the sea, using KRION® as an ideal solution.
proyectos.content_076:
A project of the magnitude of the “VIDAL SASSOON ACADEMY”, in Shanghai, China, required an exhaustive search for an ideal location. After a year and 60 candidates, an emerging cultural and social area was chosen for this building, an ideal location for creating this creative space. It is not just a hairdressing academy, but also a social meeting point for creators, and ultimately a system which behaves differently from the sum of its parts.

At this point, it was the KplusK associates which gave its avant-garde character to the design, each floor containing different stories and concepts, with a connecting point of design and culture within a style academy.

PORCELANOSA Group is participating in this emblematic project with the compact mineral KRION® in its sloping ventilated facade. We find large sized pieces, made up of sheets whose imperceptible joins achieve a futuristic design of spectacular dimensions (a total of 290m2 of KRION® fv1100 Snow White). On its front we can find the name of Vidal Sassoon in a milled low relief which can be backlit from its interior, allowing the sunset to be viewed in all its splendour. This project is designed down to the last detail, and on the side of the facade we can find KRION® machined with the small initials VS, along with a large logo. It is a facade worthy of an academic cultural centre such as this.
proyectos.content_077: The designs of ”Infinito” Quadrilatero and Tegusto, have been chosen to be realized with KRION®. The possibilities of our Solid Surface 1100 Snow White, are perfect for their personalization, their antibacterial characteristics without additives, their durability and their easy cleaning, making of KRION® a product suitable for the sector of the restoration.
proyectos.h3_078: Boston Private Industry Council - Boston - USA
proyectos.content_078: Boston Private Industry Council (PIC) is a not for profit organisation, whose mission is to connect businesses, public schools, higher education and government organisations, in order to create labour solutions and facilitate innovative education which benefits the residents and companies of Boston. The company Sterling Surfaces are again the craftspeople behind this project designed by the Spalding Tougias architecture studio. The most notable qualities of KRION® in this reception are the backlit milled low relief, the combination of colours, the purity of our Snow White colour, the unnoticeable joins, and above all the freedom of design. This is one of the most important benefits of the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, which the studio has adapted perfectly to the atmosphere of Boston Private Industry Council.
proyectos.content_079:
Advanced dentistry is the slogan chosen by Clínica Dental Asensio dental clinic, and once you have seen their facilities, you will realise that it is not just a slogan. Its futuristic aspect fits in perfectly with its latest generation instruments, professional attention and care for details, with which the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION® is combined.

With 300m2 divided between 2 floors, 20 staff members, its privileged location in Avenida del Cid nº9, Valencia - Spain, as well as the 6 rooms, 2 operating rooms, latest generation apparatus and instruments, and experience acquired since 1997, Clínica Dental Asensio is a perfect place for a complete treatment.

We can find KRION® in almost all the rooms of the clinic, the chosen colour being our star colour 1100 Snow White. The main reason why KRION® has been chosen is for its additive-free antibacterial properties, its curved form and sanitary joins. The main image of the clinic is a bar with a three dimensional curve created from 1100 Snow White, covering the rooms and operating rooms and bathrooms. This KRION® project was undertaken by VF Superficies Solidas.
proyectos.content_080: It is always satisfying to form part of a project which improves a city, and facilitates people’s lives, and this has been the case in equal measures in Enschede, Netherlands. In mid-December, the tunnel linking the Van Heek garage with the Medisch Spectrum Twente (MST) hospital was officially opened. This underground link is used by patients and visitors of the MST, and therefore project architects Atelier PROhad to keep accessibility very much in mind.
proyectos.content_081: Pulkovo Airport serves the city of Saint Petersburg, and is one of the four busiest passenger airports in Russia. The regeneration of KRION®, thanks to being fully homogenised, easy to clean, vandalism-proof, and perfect for high transit areas, makes it ideal for the transport industry. In this project we can find KRION® in various applications: the check-in desks, boarding desks, bathrooms, Business area counter, Business lounge catering area, information areas, accesses for individuals with reduced mobility, and signage. In addition to our star colour, KRION® 1100 Snow White, the most popular, we can find other colours such as 1603 Nordic Blue, 1901 Black, and 9901 Cristal Black+.
proyectos.h3_082: A Coruña University Hospital (CHUAC) - A Coruña - Galicia
proyectos.content_082:
18 operating rooms and much more created with KRION®

The CASASOLO Arquitectos studio was in charge of creating this huge project which, particularly on the 3rd floor (the new block of operating rooms), used the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®.
proyectos.h3_083: C& Partners Architects chooses KRION® in the Project of a clinic in Toronto, Canada
proyectos.content_083:
The final result of the “Eye Face Surgical Institute” is a clear example of the care and attention to detail with which the C& Partners Architects architecture and design studio creates its works, and proof that the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, meets the expectations of the most demanding studios and certifications.

It is not just the design of this spectacular clinic located in the north of Toronto, Canada which is amazing; it has operating theatres in a commercial skyscraper, meeting all the needs of the professionals who work in this establishment, which was one of the main challenges of this project.

This project has used various materials from PORCELANOSA Group, particularly KRION®, which we can find in its 1100 Snow White version on the reception desk, shelves, benches, operating theatres, washbasins, tables, shelving combined with wood, etc. We would like to thank C& Partners Architects for the trust they have placed in our material KRION®.
proyectos.h3_084: KRION™ at Joselito's, the elegant Bistro with the ”The World’s Best Ham”
proyectos.content_084:
Joselito's group has two establishments in Madrid, on Narvaez Street and on Velázquez Street, the latter premises decorated with KRION™, PORCELANOSA Group’s solid surface.

Joselito'sonVelazquez is part of the Joselito Company, whose flagship product is known worldwide and has been labelled ”The World’s Best Ham”; this Bistro, designed by Julio Touza Architects, offers high quality Joselito Iberian products and a seasonal selection.

KRION™ can be found inside the establishment, on countertops at the haute cuisine deli store, in 1100 Snow White, which emphasizes the brand’s elegant corporate red and perfectly matches the vintage and contemporary style of the establishment. KRION™’s star piece can be found in the cellar located in the basement of the premises, an old coal cellar with exposed brickwork, which boasts a spectacular table transformed by Sequoia Design, used as a private room for events and wine and ham tastings.

The common feature shared by Joselito Hams and KRION™, is their every care for the raw materials, though diametrically opposed, the goal is the same, i.e., the pursuit of excellence. Joselito has achieved this thanks to the 100% natural curing process, a century of experience and tradition, while KRION™ is taking its first steps to also become a benchmark Brand in the Solid Surface market.

As stated on their website: ”Joselito is a gastronomic gem, a legend rather than a brand”.
proyectos.h3_085: Hotel Mercure Madrid Centro (Lope de Vega) - Madrid - España
proyectos.content_085: Located at the epicentre of the Golden Triangle of Art, a location which allows the guest to visit the three most important museums of the city, just metres way –Museo del Prado, Thyssen-BornemiszaandReina Sofía – Hotel Mercure Madrid Centro (Lope de Vega) is one of the best options for visitors who love culture. For those who wish to enjoy their stay in the capital of Madrid, the hotel is very close to emblematic points such as Sol, Gran Vía, Plaza Mayor, the Congress of Deputies of the Spanish Parliament and just 800 metres from the Atocha high speed train station.
proyectos.h3_086: La Lonja del Mar - Madrid - España
proyectos.content_086:
The gastronomic experience of “La Lonja del Mar” uses KRION® in its journey.

Located in one of the most emblematic areas of Madrid, Plaza de Oriente number 6, facing the Royal Palace and right beside the Royal Theatre, we can enjoy a gastronomic experience that passes through three different times and spaces: “La Lonja del Mar”.
proyectos.content_087: Just metres from Puerta del Sol in Madrid, one of the most emblematic places for Spanish people, and a must-see for any tourist passing through the city, Hotel Francisco I is found at Calle Arenal nº 15. This is an unbeatable location, at one of the best starting points for discovering the city; and with the new renovation of its rooms, it is now also one of the best places for ending the day and enjoying a gratifying rest.
proyectos.h3_088: Abu Dhabi Mall Food Court - Abu Dhabi - Emiratos Árabes (EAU)
proyectos.content_088:
KRION® and Cloisall, quality and excellence, a perfect combination at “Abu Dhabi Mall Food Court”

The important contracting company, Cloisall Co. (L.L.C.), specialised in interior design and turnkey projects, are the distributors of the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). In this project in Abu Dhabi, they have also been in charge of transforming KRION®, and have overcome the complexities of this spectacular work.
proyectos.content_089:
The multidisciplinary studio A+ Architecture has been entrusted with creating this impressive 700m2 facade in which the 1100 Snow White version of the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, has been used, choosing the innovative “K-fix” attachment system from our colleagues at Butech.

The combination of Butech and KRION® always provides a great guarantee; however it is the French A+ Architecture studio, with a team which is not only multidisciplinary but multicultural, which has given this building located in Montpellier a hard to classify character, impressing all those who come to the “Sud de France” facilities.

Sud de France is a private 7-member initiative for presenting agricultural products from the region of Languedoc - Roussillon, with the main objective of eventually offering 2,500 products and becoming an ambassador for products from the region. In the central area of the facilities we can find a restaurant for sampling the products that we can then find in the boutique: cheeses, wines, cold meats, meat, fruit and vegetables, etc.
proyectos.h3_090: Ping Pong Table RAM - ENEBE - Francesc Rifé Studio
proyectos.content_090:
RAM. Grand Elegance Line” Ping Pong Table from ENEBE designed by the Francesc Rifé studio with KRION®

Founded in 1962, ENEBE Sport Group is a model company in the sports sector at a Spanish and European level, with great international experience. Over its 50 years of operation, it has been able to reinvent itself, using an innovative culture, encouraging values with which they have achieved great success in sectors such as padel tennis and the manufacture of trophies, as well as in table tennis, a sector in which they are a company of reference.

ENEBE Sport Group wished to enter the world of luxury, along with the prestigious Catalan studio Francesc Rifé, which has used the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, to create the new concept which combines sport and daily life, also combining innovation, functionality and glamour.

The “RAM. Grand Elegance Line” Ping Pong Tables are created with the solid surface KRION® in its 1100 Snow White version. It is an exclusive table with which ENEBE is making a strong entry into the luxury sector.
proyectos.h3_091: Times Square, el epicentro de Nueva York, ya cuenta con una fachada de KRION®
proyectos.content_091:
The FRCH Design WorkWide architecture studio, with the great support from Butech and the PORCELANOSA USA team have been in charge of installing this impressive ventilated facade made with KRION®.

The company T-Mobile has selected one of the most emblematic and recognisable locations in the world for its flagship store in Manhattan, Times Square, on 46th Street and Broadway. This spectacular location has been used many times in films, making New York one of the world’s most recognisable cities, thanks to its skyscrapers, the Brooklyn bridge and the Statue of Liberty. There is a long list of places which make us feel familiar with the city; but Times Square is certainly the best image for summarising the idiosyncrasy of New York.

The facade is made up of 70m2 of Snow White, the most popular colour of KRION®, the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, which along with the innovative K-FIX hidden attachment system, guaranteeing fast installation, makes Butech and KRION® the best solution.

We would like to take this occasion to thank FRCH Design WorkWide and T-Mobile for their trust in PORCELANOSA and our material, KRION®.
proyectos.content_092:
Madrid and Barcelona are the cities selected by EAE Business School, centres of higher education at an international level, for establishing its way of understanding higher education, in which the student is the centre of activity, considering the academic part of a programme and the enrichment of the student outside of the classroom to be integral. From the beginning, EAE has taken care in the quality of its facilities, in order to provide a suitable setting for students. This is where the compact mineral from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, appears, from the COMPEIXALAIGUA design studio and the transforming company Marmoles San Esteve.

COMPEIXALAIGUA DESIGNSTUDIO is a diverse team of young people which is committed to the design of both products and atmospheres, with ingenious, fresh and amazing results. KRION® now forms a small part of its story due to their designs for EAE Business School, on both its Madrid and Barcelona campuses.

The following images are of the centre in Calle Aragón, number 55, in Barcelona, where we can find KRION® in a 7 metre reception, in a single piece with unnoticeable joins.
proyectos.content_093:
KRION® 6201 Imperial Yellow, ideal for the corporate identity of HOLAVISION

HOLAVISION San Cugat is the first opticians in a series of establishments that will open in Catalonia in the coming year. This first facility in San Cugat has the most cutting edge optical technology on the market for detecting vision problems. In particular, the touch screens in the establishment that help us to find the glasses we need must be highlighted.
proyectos.content_094: Varenhorst Architects use KRION® for the 251 DEKALB residential complex in Philadelphia, USA
proyectos.content_095:
The Prado Tuset Arquitectos studio has been in charge of making this eye-catching project a reality. Designed as a home and used until now as a restaurant, the studio was responsible for converting it into a cancer research clinic.

The PositrónMed clinic, located in the Metropolitan region of Santiago (Chile), is specialised in the early prevention of tumours, and operated by the renowned Dr Horacio Amaral. The building has two floors on which the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, is especially important in its spectacular facade created by William Denham of Diametro, a KRION® transformation company in Santiago.

We can find KRION® PORCELANOSA Solid Surface in most of the cubicles of the clinic, in the reception, countertops, procedure rooms, work coverings and in the laborious work of its facade, the first in Chile made with KRION®. The facade has two faces with a curved area, and uses the Snow White 1100 colour, and a strip of KRION® Extreme Light 4102, the star colour of our translucent range, which we can illuminate at night.

The property of unnoticeable joins makes the facade seem like a single monolithic piece and offers the complex increased neatness and brightness, which both the Prado Tuset Arquitectos studio and the PositrónMed clinic considered fundamental from the outset.
proyectos.content_096:
The renovated 5 star NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón is found at the heart of Barcelona, a few minutes’ walk from the main places of interest, such as the Casa Batlló, La Pedrera and the Sagrada Familia. Furthermore, the Guest Relations team of the hotel will help you to discover the less well-known Barcelona. The hotel is constructed on the original site of the Teatro Calderón. Both the theatre and the hotel were designed by the same architect, Josep Rodríguez Lloveras, a student of Puig i Cadafalch (one of the fathers of modernist Catalan design).

You can have lunch or dinner at Don Giovanni, the award-winning restaurant recently opened by chef Andrea Tumbarello. After your meal, enjoy an original cocktail in C26. From its rooftop swimming pool and the terrace, 75 metres above the ground, you will be able to enjoy magnificent views of the city.

We can find the compact mineral fromPORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, transformed by the company Maderama, in the reception furniture, created with our 1100 Snow White colour, combined with 4102 Extreme Light, a material which can be backlit, allowing a complex program to combine and generate all kinds of illusions on the reception counter.

“Images granted by NH Hotel Group”
proyectos.h3_097: Cool Blue Villa - Marbella - Malaga - Spain
proyectos.content_097:
TheJasper Polak & Silke Roerig architecture studio was selected to create this spectacular single family home designed by 123DV Modern Villas. The first thing that attracts our attention when we approach this unique construction is its 100m2 ventilated facade made from KRION®, installed by Butech (a company belonging to PORCELANOSA Group) using its innovative attachment systems. After the first visual impact, we realise that we are not in an everyday home, instead finding a home where the greatest care has been taken in design and even the smallest details. It is an avant-garde, contemporary home opening onto the sea with windows that surround all the rooms.

Images:Carlos Caceres Lavergne
proyectos.content_098:
Hotel Saint-Gelais, an elegant combination of the past with the avant-garde material KRION®

At the centre of Angoulême, in the French region of Nouvelle-Aquitaine, what was formerly a Diocesan house is found, which since April 2016 has been the spectacular 4 star Hotel Saint-Gelais. This hotel has 12 rooms, a restaurant, meetings room, gym and a terrace with spectacular views.
proyectos.content_099:
KRION® in the avant-garde Ilunion Suites Madrid hotel

We can find KRION® in the hotel’s reception, in its translucent LIGHT Series format, in the 4102 Extreme Light and 4401 Pink Light colours, which are perfectly lit, combining with the decoration to create a sensation of purity, innovation and originality, making Ilunion Suites Madrid accommodation to remember.
proyectos.content_100:
Opened in 1995, created as an urban renovation in Barcelona, in 2016, the expansion and renovation of Les Glòries Shopping Mall was undertaken. This encompassed “El Mercat”, a new restaurant concept in which we can find Mediterranean, signature, Italian and Japanese cuisine both to sample in the restaurant and to take home or to the office.

The company of Santa Perpétua de Mogodo, LINING TIME, was in charge of transforming the Solid Surface from PORCELANOSA Group. We can find KRION® on the countertops of both the men’s and women’s bathrooms, and even on the special baby-change counters. The signs, located on the ceiling, which indicate the different establishments, are also made with KRION® 1100 Snow White. However, what really attracts one’s attention is the dome of the spiral staircase that allows us to access the open plaza of Les Glòries, a piece that is spectacular due to its size and circular shape, with imperceptible joins. It is a new application of KRION® in a high transit public space, in which our solid surface, as has been demonstrated in a multitude of projects, is notable for its ideal aesthetics and function.
proyectos.h3_101: Cines Bages Centre - Manresa - Barcelona - Spain
proyectos.content_101:
Multicines Bages Centre is renovated with 17 metres of bar made with KRION®

Located in Manresa, Barcelona, ​​is the Multicines Bages Centre. These cinemas are part of the Catalan society of cinemas ACEC (Área Catalana de Exhibición Cinematográfica), one of the most important groups of the circuit with 228 cinemas.
proyectos.content_102:
Grupo Faborit has 18 establishments in Spain dedicated to coffee, tea, chocolate, and fruit and vegetable juices, along with healthy food (freshly prepared salads and sandwiches) under the premise of using 100% fresh and natural products, in a pleasant atmosphere with a modern design, providing wellbeing to clients. This is where PORCELANOSA Group plays a role with its compact mineral KRION®, an ecological material that can be recycled 100%, and which is easy to clean, highly resistant to chemical attack, durable, and has an additive-free antibacterial property. It is a perfect combination between the care and attention that Faborit restaurants take with their ingredients, and the social responsibility of the solid surface KRION®.

In one of its latest openings, Faborit Alcobendas, in Calle Anabel Segura number 10, we can find KRION® in the different bars which run through the interior of the establishment in our 0101 White Nature colour. This provides increased warmth, which along with turquoise blue, the hydraulic mosaic and the brick covering, create an ideal atmosphere at any time of day.

KRION® transformed by: Encidecor, S.L.
proyectos.content_103:
Spain is one of the Top Five countries for global tourism, and its capital Madrid is one of the cities which receives the most visitors, making tourism one of the priorities of Madrid city council. For this reason it has strongly invested in quality and the dissemination of cultural values, deciding to create five urban tourist information kiosks in key locations. These are a must-visit for all those who wish to discover Madrid, and are found near the Museo del Prado museum, the Reina Sofía National Museum, in Paseo de la Castellana next to the Real Madrid Stadium (Santiago Bernabéu), in Plaza de Callao and in Paseo de Recoletos.

The task of creating these kiosks was assigned to Jose Manuel Sanz Arquitectos + Irene Brea, who with the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®, designed these eye-catching information points in the form of a clover, integrating them into the different spaces. In the words of the studio: “The aim of the design was to provide visual lightness and transparency so that the urban space could be viewed unobstructed and so that those working in the kiosk would have the sensation of working in an outdoor space in the middle of the city”.

The Jose Manuel Sanz architecture studio has created a prefabricated object which can be assembled and disassembled in just a few hours. We can find KRION® in the counters which form a 3 leaf clover, and transformed into units, which along with the visual lightness provided by tempered safety glass, and the covering which contributes with the advantage of sheltering visitors from the sun and rain, create a unique piece which is recognisable as an information point in the city.

KRION® transforming company: Candido Hermida

Photographer: José Javier Cullen
proyectos.content_104:
In the metropolitan region of Santiago de Chile, one of the finalist projects is located in the 9th PORCELANOSA Group Awards, in its Projects category.

This is a Center for Innovation and Collaboration of the company ORICA , A space designed to develop solutions that impact the future of mining.

On a surface of 270m2, the Magialiquid study had to design a space to host a great number of uses, from conferences with clients to seminars Technicians, trainings and trainings, workshops, and so on. A center that perfectly adapts to the needs of each situation, but clearly reflecting the values ​​of the company: high technology and innovation.

Precisely, to symbolize also innovation in material selection, Magialiquid wanted to have the latest generation solid surface KRION®. A resistant, thermosetting and low-porosity proposal that would meet the design needs, while ensuring total adaptability to a demanding project like this.

Inspired by the fractionation of the rocks and responding to a metaphor On the services of the company, a scenario was created for different uses from sculptural moving elements in three-dimensional format. KRION® acrylic stone in 1100 Snow White was used on all surfaces of the space, which in contrast to the touch screens allowed to reinforce that image of high tech center.

In short, a style center Futurist who, playing with geometric compositions movable, takes full advantage of the virtues of KRION® to enhance the brand image and its values.
proyectos.content_105:
Renovating an establishment that was already a point of reference for nightlife, known for its atmosphere in the city of Gaditana de Conil, in the south of Spain, was a difficult task that Velvet Projects was able to masterfully complete for the new Ícaro Night Club.

Jose Ramon Losada, owner of the studio, used the mythological story of Icarus as the basis for capturing the importance of light in the composition of the premises, evoking the sun as a connecting link between light and the movement of shadows and reflections.
proyectos.h3_106: L’Institut de Chirurgie Guidée par l’Image “IHU” - Estrasburgo - Francia
proyectos.content_106:
KRION® in the exceptional reception of IHU – Strasbourg

L’Institut de Chirurgie Guidée par l’Image “IHU” (Institute of Image Guided Surgery) is at the heart of Strasbourg University Hospital, connected with the New University Hospital, near the centre of the city. All its activities have been consolidated in a new 13,000m2 building that incorporates the latest medical imaging technology, which facilitates the development of the patients and promotes exchange between medical teams.
proyectos.h3_107: Helados el Malagueño - Zahara de los Atunes - Cadiz - Spain
proyectos.content_107:
El Malagueño, more than just an ice cream parlour, created by Velvet Projects with KRION®

If art reigns supreme anywhere in Spain, it is without a doubt in Cádiz. It is the home to singers, guitarists, poets and any kind of artistic genius, felt in the province of Cádiz merely by walking through its streets. Today we visit Zahara de los Atunes, 60km from the capital, Cádiz, and very near to the spectacular beaches of Bolonia-Tarifa, where the “El Malagueño” ice cream parlour is found. This establishment is proof that the genius of Cádiz can dazzle us in any of its areas, and was created by Velvet Projects.
proyectos.h3_108: The Emirates Hall – UN – Geneva – Swiss
proyectos.content_108:
For KRION®, the Solid Surface from PORCELANOSA Group, all projects in which our material is present are important, but occasionally there are projects that we are especially proud to have been a part of. We would like to take this occasion to thank the architectsSlavash Adeli and Joakim de Rham, and the transforming company C.C.M. ITALY, for trusting in our material KRION® for the fittings of “The Emirates Hall” within building E of the United Nations (UN) in Geneva, Switzerland.

C.C.M. ITALY, with headquarters in Bergamo, is specialised in the design, manufacture and installations of interior products and systems for airports, metro/train stations and ferry terminals, an organisation oriented towards large projects, capable of managing a fully integrated package of interior fittings, finishes and accessories. Due to its varied background and its reputation established by a multitude of projects, it was selected by the prestigious architects Siavosh Adeli (Adeli Interior Architecture & Partners Ltd) and Joakim de Rham (Swiss Office Interior Design), for the construction of this project, one of its most emblematic.
proyectos.h3_109: URO Vehículos Especiales S.A. (UROVESA) – A Coruña - Spain
proyectos.content_109:
ConWith over 35 years of experience in its sector, URO Vehículos Especiales S.A. (UROVESA) is a company in the automotive sector, designing and manufacturing special all-terrain vehicles, with an extensive range of applications in very different areas, including industrial and military activities. With its original headquarters in Santiago de Compostela, A Coruña – Spain, it has become a leader in the Spanish market, and is globally renowned in the field of manufacturing special all-terrain vehicles.

UROVESA currently has a space of over 52,000m2, divided between three industrial facilities. For the offices of its largest and most modern factory, recently constructed in Valga, Pontevedra, UROVESA, along with KRION® transforming company Cándido Hermida Nuevos Materiales, selected the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group for the coverings of the staircases of the main lobby. Specifically, the selected material was KRION® 1100 Snow White.

The result is a spectacular 180º staircase, with a monolithic design protecting tear-shaped lighting falling from the ceiling, for which the compact mineral KRION® has been curved, connected with unnoticeable joins, achieving a final assembly with a notable sculptural appearance.
proyectos.content_110:
On one of the streets that connects Puerta del Sol and Gran Vía in Madrid, Calle Montera, Carrefour Express Montera is found, the new premises of the Grup Supeco Maxor group, whose facade has been created with the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®.

In charge of renovating this establishment was the Cimbra Arquitectos SLP studio, specialised in retail, and more specifically in the supermarket sector, where they offer a comprehensive technical turnkey service. In this case they were responsible for both the design and the management of the works, and for obtaining licenses, etc.

KRION® colour 6301 Fruit has been perfectly combined with the corporate orange colour of the Carrefour Express establishments, which along with our 4102 Extreme Light colour which can be backlit, create a balance allowing better cleaning during the day, and subtle lighting at night, which will be noted by passers-by.
proyectos.h3_111: FACSA fuente pública de ósmosis inversa – Castellón – Spain
proyectos.content_111:
The company belonging to the Grupo Gimeno group, FACSA , one of the Spanish private companies with the most experience in water services management, has inaugurated its 7th public fountain in the city of Castellón. In the case of the fountain installed in Calle Honori García García number 37, it has been fully created with the solid surface from PORCELANOSA Group, KRION®.

This fountain has a sufficient capacity to provide over 4,000 litres of water per day. The water it provides is treated through a reverse osmosis process, which is then remineralised to give it physical-chemical values similar to bottled mineral waters.

One of the most important properties of our material KRION®, which led to its selection by FACSA, is the additive-free antibacterial property. The non-proliferation of fungus and bacteria, the ease of cleaning graffiti, and the possibility of regeneration to restore it to its initial state make KRION® the ideal material for this kind of public installation.

empresa.contenido:
The Solid Surface from PORCELANOSA Group

KRION™ is a new generation solid surface developed by SYSTEMPOOL, a company that belongs to PORCELANOSA Group.

With more than 400 showrooms spread worldwide; from Madrid to New York, through cities like London, Milan or Paris, PORCELANOSA Group thus assures its presence in the five continents to show the steady improvement in innovation and design of all its products.

At PORCELANOSA we base the success of our products on three premises; unconditional quality, a commercial network of our own and an infrastructure to embrace all these factors. We think the infrastructure is key to the success of our products. We want our installations to have a perfect combination of functionality, versatility and distinction.
